TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ObjectPoolingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ObjectPoolingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ObjectPoolingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 启用和配置用于组件的对象池。

span.span: Enables and configures object pooling for a component.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定了对象池，则它必须不禁用 COM + 目录; 中如果启用 COM + 目录中，必须将它指定在组件上。If object pooling is specified, it must not be disabled in the COM+ catalog; if enabled in the COM+ catalog, it must be specified on the component. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this attribute. remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使它是一个公共方法，方法只为了从内部.NET Framework 基础结构使用。Even though it is a public method, the method is intended only to be used from within the .NET Framework infrastructure. 它是为开发人员应用足够类属性，然后在其界面设置其他成员。It is sufficient for a developer to apply the class attribute and set other members in its interface.

summary.span: 获取或设置在引发异常前等待对象可用于池中的时间长度。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time to wait for an object to become available in the pool before throwing an exception.
This value is in milliseconds.
The time-out value in milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定多长时间客户端将等待，以毫秒为单位，若要从池中返回对象。Specifies how long a client will wait, in milliseconds, for an object to be returned from the pool. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxPoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxPoolSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置表示池的最大大小的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value for the maximum size of the pool.
The maximum number of objects in the pool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示将要创建池管理器，主动所用的客户端，以及池中处于非活动状态的共用对象的最大数目。 represents the maximum number of pooled objects that the pooling manager will create, both actively used by clients and inactive in the pool. 创建对象时，池管理器将检查以验证尚未达到最大池大小而如果没有，池管理器创建一个新的对象，将分配给客户端。When creating objects, the pooling manager checks to verify that the maximum pool size has not been reached and, if it has not, the pooling manager creates a new object to dispense to the client. 如果已达到最大池大小，则客户端请求进行排队和池中的线程到达的顺序接收的第一个可用对象。If the maximum pool size has been reached, client requests are queued and receive the first available object from the pool in the order in which they arrived. 在指定时间段后，对象创建请求超时。Object creation requests time-out after a specified period. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/CPP/inspector.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/CS/inspector.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/VB/inspector.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinPoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MinPoolSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置表示池的最小大小的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value for the minimum size of the pool.
The minimum number of objects in the pool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示应用程序启动时创建的对象的数目和运行应用程序时保留在池中的对象的最小数目。 represents the number of objects that are created when the application starts and the minimum number of objects that are maintained in the pool while the application is running. 如果在池中的可用对象的数目低于指定的最小值，创建新对象以满足任何未完成的对象的请求，并重新填充该池。If the number of available objects in the pool drops below the specified minimum, new objects are created to meet any outstanding object requests and refill the pool. 如果在池中的可用对象的数目大于最小数量，那些多余的对象会被销毁在清理周期。If the number of available objects in the pool is greater than the minimum number, those surplus objects are destroyed during a clean-up cycle. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/CPP/inspector.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/CS/inspector.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/VB/inspector.vb#1)]
